title: Monitoring WildFly with Prometheus and Grafana
content: This is the third tutorial about how to use Prometheus server to capture metrics from a Microprofile compatible server like WildFly or Quarkus. In the first two tutorials, we have discussed how to set up Prometheus to connect to WildFly (Monitoring WildFly with Prometheus) and QuarkusÂ ( Monitoring Quarkus with Prometheus) to capture Microprofile metrics.
